comments.text:
You damn Cena fans. Ambrose is one of the top newcomers in the WWE right 
now. He's pretty much the only superstar at the moment to bring back high 
flying daredevil tactics and stunts. Orton is also one of the best in the 
business right now. He along with Ambrose, Rollins and Cesaro are some of 
the few that would actually make it and last in the attitude era. The only 
problem with Cesaro is he has bad mic skills. Plenty of wrestlers have 
acknowledged that Cesaro is a unique and very talented superstar. Why do 
you think stone cold criticized Vince for not giving him a better push.
